title: folders
content:
I clicked on something wrong and now I have a new "trash" folder as a subfolder under the "sent" folder. I cannot delete it and all my trash goes into it. The old one is still where it is supposed to be and stays empty. How can I delete the new one and send all my trash to the old one where it belongs?

I have no idea what I clicked on that created this problem.

Thanks for any help.
creator: ernesti1

title: mail group
content: When in an e mail which has an e mail group from my own address book in the TO: field, how do I click on it and see the addresses included in the e mail group?
creator: lynnaarn1
